s.text: Well, the Times explains, then the federal gift tax applies.
Well, the Times explains, then the federal gift tax applies.
In a separate TV appearance, says the paper, the acting deputy prime minister advocated making the U.S. dollar once again legal Russian tender.
Mirage has hired a probation officer to monitor the ex-inmates and to help co-workers deal with discomfort--a big problem, apparently.
